item.title: Practical Tips To Improve Readability and Quality Of Your Python Code
item.description:
Readable code is a sign of professionalism.

You can’t get better if you are doing the same things over and over again. To get better, we must stretch from our comfort zone, and learn and implement what is missing in our knowledge gap. Here are some ways that help you write better code:

Read PEP-8 It is a set of official python recommendations and guidelines to improve the readability of your python code. It contains guidelines on naming conventions, indentations, layout, etc.
